meaningMnemonic: Something that is <kanji>new</kanji> and <kanji>sharp</kanji> (presumably because it's so new) is on the <vocabulary>cutting edge</vocabulary>. It's <vocabulary>up-and-coming</vocabulary>, the next big thing!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
